spatial_accuracy.notes: Door swings in Bedroom-2 and primary toilets are incorrectly oriented. Room proportions for the kitchen and utility area are distorted, appearing narrower than the plan specs.

structural_fidelity.notes: Missing structural niches in the master bedroom and living room. Column indicators from the 2D plan are modeled inconsistently as flat wall sections.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture layout adheres to plan, but dining table scale is slightly oversized, obstructing the passage flow compared to the 2D layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality rendering with consistent orthographic projection. Lighting and shadows are clean, though text labeling is slightly blurred.

detected_errors.description: Incorrect door leaf orientation in several internal rooms (Bedroom-2 entrance and Toilet).
Kitchen and Utility area dimensions are compressed compared to the 2D floor plan ratio.
Missing niche detailing on the external wall of the Master Bedroom.
Toilet fixtures in the central bathroom are slightly offset from the plumbing wall specified in the plan.
